content: Meh. It seems to me that you are masturbating over an author who is barely relevant. Sure he’s smart but so are a lot of successful people, sure he went through a thing or two but so have a lot of successful people, many of which have stories that make his look like a bedtime story. But, to be realistic without Jurassic Park he would still be basically a nobody that only avid book readers would have heard about. Stephen King’s story is much more interesting and he is a much more prolific writer.
